briefTitle: Complementary Food Supplements for Reducing Childhood Undernutrition

armGroups.label: Chickpea based complementary food supplement
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Chickpea based complementary food supplement

armGroups.label: Rice based complementary food supplement
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Rice based complementary food supplement

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Infants 6 months of age

outcomeMeasures.title: Stunting in Children at 18 mo
outcomeMeasures.description: Prevalence of stunting at 18 months of age.

outcomeMeasures.title: Morbidity
outcomeMeasures.description: weekly morbidity will be assessed for a year and episodes of diarrhea, dysentery ALRI, and fever will be recorded.

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Composition
outcomeMeasures.description: Bioelectrical impedance analysis will be used to look at body composition changes from baseline until 18 months of age

outcomeMeasures.title: Developmental Milestones
outcomeMeasures.description: Age-specific developmental milestones will be assessed

outcomeMeasures.title: Micronutrient Status
outcomeMeasures.description: Iron, vitamin A, zinc and other micronutrient status of children will be examined by intervention group.

outcomeMeasures.title: Intestinal Function
outcomeMeasures.description: Intestinal function using L:M and other biomarkers will be assessed by intervention group and its association with child growth

outcomeMeasures.title: Maternal Knowledge, Attitude and Practice Related to Infant and Young Child Feeding
